name: Vegan BLT Sandwich with Baked Tempeh Bacon
description: Vegan BLT Sandwiches made with smoky baked tempeh bacon. Use store bought vegan mayo or make homemade tofu mayo and pile on the lettuce, tomato slices, tempeh bacon and optional sprouts & avocado!
recipeIngredient: 1 batch Vegan Mayo (or store bought vegan mayo)
8-12 slices bread of choice (I used sourdough) (*check ingredients to ensure vegan)
1-2 heads lettuce (use either romaine, iceberg or even baby kale for a change)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the tempeh bacon. Make the vegan mayo if using.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the tempeh bacon. Make the vegan mayo if using.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast your bread, and layer with vegan mayo, tempeh bacon, lettuce, tomato and optional avocado and sprouts.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast your bread, and layer with vegan mayo, tempeh bacon, lettuce, tomato and optional avocado and sprouts.
